languages.text: {n}На мгновение ваше дыхание сбивается и в глазах темнеет — {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}призраки невыносимой боли{/d} овладевают вами. Во взгляде Соломона мелькает понимание, и он умолкает, давая вам время перевести дух.{/n}

{n}For a moment, your breathing falters and your vision goes dark as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}ghosts of unbearable pain{/d} overwhelm you. Solomorne's eyes glimmer with understanding, and he falls silent, giving you time to catch your breath.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На мгновение ваше дыхание сбивается и в глазах темнеет — {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}призраки невыносимой боли{/d} овладевают вами. Во взгляде Соломона мелькает понимание, и он умолкает, давая вам время перевести дух.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}For a moment, your breathing falters and your vision goes dark as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}ghosts of unbearable pain{/d} overwhelm you. Solomorne's eyes glimmer with understanding, and he falls silent, giving you time to catch your breath.{/n}

{n}For a moment, your breathing falters and your vision goes dark as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}ghosts of unbearable pain{/d} overwhelm you. Solomorne's eyes glimmer with understanding, and he falls silent, giving you time to catch your breath.{/n}

{n}For a moment, your breathing falters and your vision goes dark as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}ghosts of unbearable pain{/d} overwhelm you. Solomorne's eyes glimmer with understanding, and he falls silent, giving you time to catch your breath.{/n}

{n}For a moment, your breathing falters and your vision goes dark as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}ghosts of unbearable pain{/d} overwhelm you. Solomorne's eyes glimmer with understanding, and he falls silent, giving you time to catch your breath.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一瞬、呼吸が乱れ、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}耐え難い苦痛{/d}があなたを襲い、視界が暗くなった。ソロモーンの目は理解したことを示し、沈黙し、あなたに息を整える時間を与えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, your breathing falters and your vision goes dark as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}ghosts of unbearable pain{/d} overwhelm you. Solomorne's eyes glimmer with understanding, and he falls silent, giving you time to catch your breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一瞬、呼吸が乱れ、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}耐え難い苦痛{/d}があなたを襲い、視界が暗くなった。ソロモーンの目は理解したことを示し、沈黙し、あなたに息を整える時間を与えた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Für einen Augenblick stockt dein Atem, und dir wird schwarz vor Augen, als {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Geister unerträglicher Schmerzen{/d} dich überwältigen. In Solomornes Augen liegt Verständnis, und er schweigt, bis du wieder zu Atem kommst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, your breathing falters and your vision goes dark as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}ghosts of unbearable pain{/d} overwhelm you. Solomorne's eyes glimmer with understanding, and he falls silent, giving you time to catch your breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Für einen Augenblick stockt dein Atem, und dir wird schwarz vor Augen, als {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Geister unerträglicher Schmerzen{/d} dich überwältigen. In Solomornes Augen liegt Verständnis, und er schweigt, bis du wieder zu Atem kommst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir an için soluğun kesiliyor, gözün kararıyor. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Tahammül edilmez acıların hayaletleri{/d} ruhunu sarıyor. Solomorne'un bakışları anlayışla ışıldıyor, susup nefesini toparlamanı bekliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, your breathing falters and your vision goes dark as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}ghosts of unbearable pain{/d} overwhelm you. Solomorne's eyes glimmer with understanding, and he falls silent, giving you time to catch your breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir an için soluğun kesilir, gözlerin kararır. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Tahammül edilmez acıların hayaletleri{/d} ruhunu sarar. Solomorne'un bakışları anlayışla ışıldar, susup nefesini toparlamanı bekler.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por un momento, tu respiración flaquea y tu vista se nubla cuando los {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}fantasmas de un dolor incalculable{/d} te abruman. Solomorne te mira, comprensivo, y guarda silencio para darte tiempo a coger aliento.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, your breathing falters and your vision goes dark as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}ghosts of unbearable pain{/d} overwhelm you. Solomorne's eyes glimmer with understanding, and he falls silent, giving you time to catch your breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por un momento, tu respiración flaquea y tu vista se nubla cuando los {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}fantasmas de un dolor incalculable{/d} te abruman. Solomorne te mira, comprensivo, y guarda silencio para darte tiempo a coger aliento.{/n}

languages.text: {n}有那么一瞬间，你的呼吸开始颤抖，眼前也开始发黑。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}难以忍受的痛楚仿佛依然在折磨着你{/d}。索罗蒙的目光中闪烁着理解的光芒，随后也沉默下来，给了你喘息的机会。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, your breathing falters and your vision goes dark as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}ghosts of unbearable pain{/d} overwhelm you. Solomorne's eyes glimmer with understanding, and he falls silent, giving you time to catch your breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}有那么一瞬间，你的呼吸开始颤抖，眼前也开始发黑。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}难以忍受的痛楚仿佛依然在折磨着你{/d}。索罗蒙的目光中闪烁着理解的光芒，随后也沉默下来，给了你喘息的机会。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre souffle se fait court et votre vue se trouble tandis que les {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}fantômes de la douleur atroce{/d} vous assaillent. Vous décelez une lueur de compréhension dans le regard de Solomorne, qui reste silencieux et vous laisse le temps de reprendre votre souffle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, your breathing falters and your vision goes dark as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}ghosts of unbearable pain{/d} overwhelm you. Solomorne's eyes glimmer with understanding, and he falls silent, giving you time to catch your breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre souffle se fait court et votre vue se trouble tandis que les {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}fantômes de la douleur atroce{/d} vous assaillent. Vous décelez une lueur de compréhension dans le regard de Solomorne, qui reste silencieux et vous laisse le temps de reprendre votre souffle.{/n}
